Original:
初訪呼卡商行的起因只是心血來潮、便找了個離家不遠的店去探探，雖然我不會抽水煙，也不妨礙我的興致。這天是個平日夜晚，店內沒有其他客人，坐在落地窗前的沙發座位、優哉游哉地看著街景，不失為一種享受，只是天母店沒什麼調酒可以點，有點可惜。

----------
【生蠔】
有生蠔我一定要吃一下啦～滋味鮮美，令人回味。

【火山雞米花】
炸雞球配番茄醬，不錯吃。

【Gin Fizz】
滋味清爽，酒感很輕。

【Highball／Soda】

The cause of the initial visit to Hoka Shangxing was just a tide, and I found a shop not far from home to explore. Although I would not smoke smoke, I did not hinder my interest.This day is a weekday night. There are no other guests in the store. The sofa seats sitting in front of the floor -to -ceiling window look at the street view.

-----------
【Oyster】
I must eat oysters ~ It is delicious and remembered.

【Volver Chicken and Mihua】
Fried chicken ball with tomato sauce, good to eat.

【Gin FIZZ】
The taste is refreshing and the wine feels very light.

【Highball / SODA】
I have always liked Highball's bubble taste and faint whiskey flavor, and the refreshing taste of lemon.

Original:
發現寶藏吹水煙地方。

我一直蠻喜歡水煙的，不用像喝酒一樣喝到很飽，就可以達到輕飄飄的效果。這家店位於二樓，意外空間滿大的，裝潢不錯，有數個面向忠誠路的位子，可以看著窗外放鬆下。

點了＜Watermellon Chill>水煙，確實很Chill, 味道不錯帶點涼，店內店員會很親切的教怎麽使用，我們一直在練習怎麽吹出甜甜圈形狀的煙圈。

店內台灣精釀啤酒口味也很有趣，我點了＜去邊吐司紅茶冰＞朋友點了＜甘草芭樂＞都是喝起來很有意思的啤酒，口味也不錯。

最後可圈可點的是店內的小食價格非常合理，我們點了薯條、墨西哥脆片、干貝水餃，干貝水餃必點，應該是巧之味的。

總之當天跟朋友聚的很盡興，推薦給大家天母好店。
EN:
Discover the place where the treasure blows water.

I have always liked water cigarettes. I do n’t have to drink like drinking, so I can achieve the effect of light fluttering.This shop is located on the second floor. The unexpected space is full and the decoration is good. There are several seats facing loyalty. You can look at the window to relax.

Clicking <Watermllon Chill> Water smoke, it is indeed very chill, the taste is good, with a little cool, the shop staff will be kind to teach how to use it, we have been practicing how to blow out the sweets -shaped cigarette ring.

The taste of Taiwan's craft beer in the store is also very interesting. I ordered <Go to the toast black tea ice> my friend ordered <Licorice Bara> is a very interesting beer, and the taste is also good.

In the end, the price of snacks in the store is very reasonable. We ordered French fries, Mexican crisps, scallop dumplings, and scallop dumplings must be ordered. It should be clever.

In short, I am very happy to get together with friends that day, and I recommend it to everyone in the Mother's Mother's Store.

再來就是—》去Hookah找阿寶店長抽水煙

音樂chill、環境chill、basically everything’s chill
之前被找去抽水煙都在西門（個人認為西門很亂）
所以不敢去～

本身北投人，終於在今年某一天被抓去天母抽水煙
我立馬答應我朋友🤣
天母本身就不會雜亂，現在有了呼卡，當然要多多捧場（雖然前幾個月我一直預定位置，但是因為疫情太怕，就一直取消😅）

Nvm，現在什麼都不care，今天！心情差到爆炸，直接跟呼卡說預定一個人，沒想到爆多人，但幸好，我本來就在外面，22:30預約，就答應我有位置就打給我，結果～這次我說到做到！

還跟阿寶店長互相認識聊天談心～

今天來跟大家說：心情好，來呼卡。心情差，來呼卡，難過時，來呼卡。憤怒時，照樣來呼卡。

來欣賞帥哥阿寶、帥哥店員們
帥哥們隨時願意陪你聊天、為你服務

不用說話，來呼卡，就對了！

Just keep calm and smoke hookah
Whatever your plan is, just come visit hookah
Wherever u are, still, come visit hookah
You’re the best.
